mapper.select: select master_code selectKey , master_name selectValue from xiangqin.m01_code_master_info where code_type = #{codeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into xiangqin.m01_code_master_info (code_type, master_code, code_type_name, master_name) values (#{codeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{masterCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{codeTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{masterName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into xiangqin.m01_code_master_info
code_type,
master_code,
code_type_name,
master_name,
